segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, stretching toward the cookie jar with such determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His excitement is palpable as he grips that plate, ready to catch the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my heart sinks a little as I see how close he is to tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How reckless this seems, yet to him, it's just a daring adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the thrill in his eyes; he must think he's being so clever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: At that moment, I wonder if the joy of cookies is worth the risk he's taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost want to call out, but I know it would ruin the moment for him.
segments.speaker: PAR
